parameters: \px[420] The door seems to require a 4 digit code.
\px[420] These are worn out and indecipherable.
\px[420] These are worn out and indecipherable.
\px[420] These are worn out and indecipherable.
\px[420] These are worn out and indecipherable.
\px[420] These are worn out and indecipherable.
\px[420] These are worn out and indecipherable.
\px[280]*You examine the phototag hanging from the skeleton's neck.*
\px[350] 0300 In a dark building surrounded by enforcers.
\px[380] A \c[6]Kou\fr stands at the end of a wide hallway.
\px[270] He faces a pile of stringed bodies, his hands drenched in blood.
\px[350] \c[3]Someone\fr thunders into the hallway behind him.
\px[250] \fbKou?! \|\fr*curses* \|I can't keep covering for you! I told you to \fistop\fr this!
\px[200] The \fbUnderworld's\fr leaders are even working with us \fbLawmen\fr to \fifind you\fr.
\px[330] This is dangerous, Kou. You're on everyone's radar.
\px[380] The whole prefecture is at \fi\fbwar\fr against you!
\px[400] I...\| found the case file on your family.
\px[290] There were hidden records that wasn't released to the orphanage.
\px[400] The organization that killed your family.\w[10].\w[10].\w[10]
\px[200] You were rescued from them at a young age, but the family that saved you
\px[380] had some dealings with the organization...
\px[440] All the more reason to end them.
\px[230] I'm doing you a favor too. I'm ridding this world of \fbbastards\fr, \fidetective.
\px[350] Wh- You still don't get it??! It's all meaningless!
\px[400] You're doing the same thing \fithey\fr did!!
\px[180] You're wasting you're life on the past!! You're just trapping yourself in an endless -
\px[400] I know he's right. \|You're always right, V...
\px[430] It's a pain to carry it all on my back.
\px[470] I know I can't live like this.
\px[400] But there's too many that need to \fbdie.
\px[220] \c[6]Kou\fr stands on the rooftop, looking down at the city square. A trigger
\px[200] is under his thumb. He eyes the faces that once took his adopted family's.
\px[400] One last death. Then I'll stop for you, V-
\px[350] Wha- Verne?!! \fbGET OUT OF THERE! RU-!
\px[420] I didn't do anything! It was their fault.
\px[420] They put him there. \fiThey'll pay for this.
